mapper.sql: select menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, path, component, menu_type, visible, status, perms, icon, create_time from sys_menu
mapper.select: select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where m.status = '0' and r.status = '0' and ur.user_id = #{userId}
select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id where m.status = '0' and rm.role_id = #{roleId}
